title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

items.title: What We Know About the Minneapolis Catholic School Shooting
items.description: Investigators were still searching for a motive in the shooting, which left two children dead at Annunciation Catholic Church in Minneapolis.

items.title: These investigators patrol Las Vegas looking for one thing: water waste
items.description: The Southern Nevada Water Authority has investigators who patrol Las Vegas neighborhoods in search of wasted water.
